name: HoverCard
description: Rich preview card that appears on hover or focus with configurable delays

accessibility.screenReader: Trigger has aria-haspopup and aria-expanded. Opens on focus for keyboard users. Content is accessible while open. Escape dismisses the card. Non-modal - doesn't trap focus.
knownLimitations: Content must be reachable by both mouse and keyboard users

recommendedUsage: Use for previewing linked content like user profiles, article summaries, or product details. Configure appropriate open/close delays for the interaction pattern.
antiPatterns: Do not use for essential information that must be visible. Avoid putting interactive forms inside hover cards. Do not use for touch-only interfaces.
